direct_low.description: Lowest direct price, key max price indicator
direct_low.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id, then backfill
direct_low.evaluation: NaNs reduced, but 1.37% remain for card_sku_ids with no data.

market.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id, then backfill

low.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id, then backfill
low.evaluation: No NaNs, suitable for price continuity.

lowest_list.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id, then backfill

sales_quantity.method: Aggregate by card_sku_id and date, fill missing days with 0

sales_price_max.method: Aggregate by card_sku_id and date, fill missing days with 0

price.method: Leave NaNs for missing days, flagged as is_missing_day
price.evaluation: NaNs preserved for missing days, to be handled in clean_data.py.

quantity.evaluation: No NaNs, indicates no inventory on missing days.

direct_inventory_count.evaluation: No NaNs, suitable for inventory tracking.

set_name.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id

rarity.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id

condition.method: Fill NaNs with last known value per card_sku_id

issues.description: clean_data.py error: 'card_sku_id' missing after outlier removal
listings table lacks explicit out-of-stock records (quantity == 0, direct_inventory_count == 0), indicating data unavailability
issues.resolution: Handled in merge_data.py with is_missing_day flag and zero imputation

issues.description: significant missing days in listings and market_prices (e.g., 2025-04-19 to 2025-04-22, 2025-05-05)
issues.resolution: Handled in merge_data.py with is_missing_day flag and zero imputation

issues.description: recurring TypeError: Object of type Timestamp is not JSON serializable in scratch files
high NaNs in sales_history post-merge (34.85% granular)
issues.resolution: Resolved in merge_data.py with date aggregation and zero-filling

issues.description: high outlier removal rate in sales_history (7.81% IQR 2.0, 4.93% IQR 3.0)
issues.resolution: Mitigated with asymmetric IQR (0.61% with high_multiplier=10.0)

issues.description: pipeline.py failed due to missing pandas import
pipeline.py failed due to merge_data naming conflict
issues.resolution: Resolved by renaming argument to run_merge_data

notes: Project predicts maximum sales prices for Magic: The Gathering cards using TimescaleDB data (market_prices, sales_history, listings) and card_attributes.csv. Completed fetch_card_data, fetch_market_data, merge_data, and pipeline modules. fetch_market_data.py simplified listings query (removed price_rank <= 5, added is_low_inventory flag for direct_inventory_count <= 5). merge_data.py implements granular merge with a complete grid of card_sku_id and dates, carrying forward market_prices, setting listings quantity and direct_inventory_count to 0 for missing days (indicating data unavailability) with an is_missing_day flag, and filling sales_history missing days with zeros (sales_quantity = 0, sales_price_max = 0). Latest merge_data.py run (2025-05-10T13:57:51) succeeded, producing 7,038,364 rows with 426,548 NaNs in listings price (6.06%) and 96,185 NaNs in direct_low (1.37%). Pipeline saves merged data to data/processed/merged_data_<timestamp>.csv. Outlier Analysis: Asymmetric IQR (low: 1.5, high: 10.0) removed 0.61% (10,256 rows, $58.15â€“$500.00, mean $83.22), preserving high prices. Validation flagged 41 rows > 100x direct_low (excluding direct_low == 0), saved to logs/extreme_outliers_<timestamp>.csv for review. Random samples saved to logs/random_sample_<timestamp>.csv for test cases. Direct Low Insight: 1.37% NaNs indicate card_sku_ids with no direct_low data, flagged as is_all_direct_low_nan for clean_data.py. Next Steps: Develop clean_data.py to validate outliers, impute NaNs, and encode features. Optimize fetch_market_data.py for speed.
